Text: multiple rar files for a TV show??? What is this 2003?
Thank you very much for your time and effort to share this with us.
I dunno about y'all but I'm about ready for an RTS or RPG set in the Thundercats world.

@kimsballs "multiple rar files for a TV show??? What is this 2003?" - Multiple RAR-Files is a standard releaseform. Initially it's intended so that pepole can download peice by peice from a cloud-site/file server. But an additional benefit is that RAR seems to download faster than a single large file. Less room for errors to occur as well. To make it easy, download Total Commander (the ULTIMATE file-handling tool, with roots back in MS-DOS) and download the command prompt version of RAR and add it to Total Commander's packing tools. No need for WinRar. Pepole need to learn how to overcome slight "inconveniences". ;) - Thanks for the upload!
